context: PayPal Holdings, Inc. is a digital payments company focused on online payments, Venmo, Braintree, and merchant services. COVID e-commerce surge. Crypto trading added.

competitors.name: Square (Block)
competitors.notes: Payment processing, Cash App P2P, and merchant services

competitors.name: Apple Pay
competitors.notes: Mobile wallet with growing online acceptance

competitors.name: Adyen
competitors.notes: Enterprise payment platform for large merchants

competitors.name: Klarna
competitors.notes: Buy now pay later competitor to PayPal Credit

competitors.name: Afterpay
competitors.notes: BNPL platform popular with younger consumers
